short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects Madgrades and Rate My Professors data into the UW-Madison Course Search & Enroll Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you a UW-Madison student who constantly switches between Course Search & Enroll, Rate My Professors, and Madgrades. This extension uses the Madgrades and Rate My Professors APIs to fetch data for courses and professors, and link to the pages for them.
